parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign finance.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Valeriu Iftime, the president of PNL Botoșani and president of the Botoșani County Council.  It directly links him to the upcoming parliamentary elections by stating that the team he proposes "at the parliamentary elections this Sunday" is composed of people who share his values. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide geographical area (Botoșani County and surrounding areas) and age range (18-65).  The reach estimate is 100K-500K, clearly indicating an attempt to reach a large audience. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's objective is to positively portray Valeriu Iftime and his team, emphasizing their adherence to traditional values and implicitly encouraging voters to support them in the parliamentary elections. The phrasing "the team I propose at the parliamentary elections this Sunday" is a clear call to action. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post is published by "Vocea - Botosani," a news and media website, the content is not primarily journalistic. It lacks objective reporting and focuses heavily on promoting Valeriu Iftime and his political agenda. The tone is overtly supportive and promotional, exceeding the boundaries of journalistic neutrality.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post presents Valeriu Iftime's views and opinions, but it's framed within a clear campaign context.  It's not a personal opinion piece; it's a campaign message designed to influence voters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>539277882281285</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime), is published during the electoral period (although the end date is given as 1732953600, which needs to be checked against the actual election date to confirm if it's after the official end of the campaign), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters in favor of Valeriu Iftime and the PNL. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The argument that it's from a news outlet is weak, as the content is promotional, not journalistic.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 539277882281285) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează candidatul Valeriu Iftime de la PNL,  în mod evident, prin prezentarea sa într-o lumină pozitivă și prin asocierea sa cu valori tradiționale,  cu scopul de a influența votul alegătorilor.  Postarea, care a beneficiat de o sumă de bani sub 100 RON, conform Ad Library, și a atins o audiență estimată la 100.000-500.000 de persoane, conține un număr CMF (11240002), indicând clar natura sa de propagandă electorală.  Textul postării,  "echipa pe care o propun la alegerile parlamentare de duminica aceasta", constituie o îndemnare directă la vot.  Această acțiune este ilegală, deoarece are loc după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie electorală, conform prevederilor legale.  Datele de contact ale Vocea Botoșani sunt office@voceabotosani.ro și +40759112233.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
